page.title: 04SCHOOLS IN LEEK
page.content: Leek schools have been divided into three stages since 1980.The first schools for five-nine year olds feed the 2 Middle schools(9-13 years)which in turn feed 2 High Schools.When Leek changed one or two small schools were closed like St James at Longsdon which now stands empty.The Brittania street school in Leek is now used as a Gym called the Body Shop.West Street School is now part of the local College. Our school is Leek St Edward's C.E(A) Middle School which is a part of the old Leek High premises at Warrington Hall.There are 590 pupils in our school.
